interest/situation: Enjoys the outdoors and nature
description:
A personalised oak photo block, printed with your photo above a love heart containing the initials of a couple, as if carved into the wood.

Create a sentimental gift by adding a favourite photo to this solid oak photo block. Add initials to appear in a heart below the image, that appears to have been romantically carved into the wood, to make a thoughtful, sentimental photo gift to cherish for years to come.

A perfect romantic gift for a partner on any occasion, including a birthday gift, anniversary gift (specifically fifth wedding anniversary, celebrated with wood!) or Valentine gift.

A great gift for the hard to buy for or the person who has everything! Simply add a favourite photo to bring a smile to the face of the recipient.

HOW TO SUPPLY YOUR PHOTO:
• Please supply your photo AFTER your order has been placed and email to orders [!at] thedriftingbear.com with your order number

PLEASE NOTE: If your image cannot be cropped to the portrait shape, and is more suited to a landscape format, we will produce your wooden block in landscape for you. The wood colour & grain will show through behind your photo, making the photo appear slightly darker. Please see example images.

made from:
Each wooden block is handcrafted from natural oak, sourced from sustainably managed forests. Each block is natural, meaning no oil, varnish, wax or stain, just natural wood, sanded on both front and back faces.

Your wood block will arrive in either tissue paper or a natural cotton gift bag, ready to give as a gift and will be sent out in plastic free packaging with tracked delivery.

dimensions:
Standard - 15cm x 10cm, 2cm thick.
Large - 15cm x 20cm, 2cm thick.

↟ EVERY ORDER PLANTS ONE TREE - As an additional gift to you & our planet, for every order placed, The Drifting Bear Co plant one tree in an area of the world that needs it most. ↟

An original design © The Drifting Bear Co.

interest/situation: May be working in the tech industry
description:
Unique personalized gift for him! A handmade wooden phone docking station is a great gift idea for Holidays, anniversaries, Birthdays, Father's Day, housewarming, or any other occasion. Stylish cell phone charging station - desk organizer can be custom laser engraved. 

✅PERSONALIZE IT: We use top-of-the-line laser technology for precise details, ensuring the custom laser engravings look precisely as you wish.
✅ORIGINAL GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: Surprise your friend, boyfriend, husband, dad, son, co-worker, boss, and even picky grandfather. A unique and handy gift for birthdays, anniversaries, Holidays, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, housewarming, and Graduation. Phone charging stations are packed in elegant recycled gift boxes.
✅FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Forget the messy desk! Charge your phone while keeping your wallet, keys, glasses, jewelry, or other frequently used items tidy and always at hand! The stylish, timeless design will fit perfectly with any interior: modern, minimalist, rustic, or classic.
✅HANDMADE AND DURABLE: Docking stations are made of natural Plywood. All our products are carefully handcrafted, detailed, sanded, and hand-painted with organic paint. You can choose from three natural wood colors. The stand is easy to assemble - it has three pieces you must insert into each other (see the example in the images).
✅MEASUREMENTS: 17.5 cm x 25.6 cm x 17.1 cm (6.9 in x 10 in x 6.7 in). NOTE: Due to the natural grain and color variations between boards, your item's color and grain texture can differ slightly from those in the listing photos. The engraving color can be darker. Accessories are not included.
This product is handmade by our production partners and shipped from Lithuania.
Personalized gifts for Him and more athttps://www.etsy.com/shop/PersonalizedGiftMen
▼ HOW TO ORDER A PERSONALIZED DOCKING STATION ▼
1. Choose the engraving option and the color, and write us the number of the chosen design.
2. Fill in the personalization section. You can write your text with the needed font or select any logo from our designs.
3. Select shipping options (Standard or express).
IMPORTANT: If you select Express shipping, please leave your phone number in the order notes.
4. We will send you a sketch of what the engraving will look like.
We will send the order without confirmation if you confirm the sketch when shipping is due.
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask us.
product: Personalised Christmas Gift for Him Cell Phone Docking Charging Station Stand Tech Accessory Desk Organizer Handmade Gift Boyfriend Man Men

interest/situation: Enjoys creating and nurturing things
description:
Looking for the best Baby Gift? Personalized Wooden Busy Board with Name Puzzle is a great gift for baby boy or baby girl First Birthday, 1st Christmas, Baby shower. 

Busy Board with Name Puzzle is a great idea to turn the process of learning letters into a play! 

Sensory board improves fine motor skills, babies play with new objects, shapes, colors and studies them, it helps to develop logic, memory, finger grip and attention.

Our Name Puzzle made from non-toxic high quality plywood, we carefully polish every detail, the pegs for letters and shapes are mounted very securely for the safety of your baby! 

For painting we use safe Certified water based paint, the color can be chosen from the proposed options.

Approximate Dimensions 

*Length: 14.57 inches (37 cm)
*Height:  9 inches (23 cm)

The specified sizes refer to a puzzle up to 6-7 letters. The size of your puzzle will depend on the number of letters in your child's name. If the name has more than 6-7 letters, the size of the board will be increased.

The base of the board is 0.35 inches thin (9 mm) and each letter is 0.24 inches thin (6 mm) and  2.44 inches tall (62 mm).

IF IN YOUR PUZZLE YOU HAVE LETTER ”I” - BE ATTENTIVE. THIS SHAPES CAN BE DANGEROUS FOR KIDS 0-3. DON’T LEAVE YOUR CHILD ALONE,  Instead - play with your kid and collect memories 😊
product: Personalized Wooden Busy Board with Name Puzzle

description:
**Handmade:** Crafted in traditional Tuscan manufactories, ensuring exceptional quality and craftsmanship.

**Genuine Leather:** Constructed from durable and luxurious cowhide leather, providing a timeless and sophisticated look.

**Versatile Design:** Versatile 3-in-1 design allows it to be worn as a fanny pack, hip bag, or crossbody bag, catering to various needs and occasions.

interest/situation: May be interested in fashion design or working in the fashion industry
description:
Elevate your style with our personalized cufflinks, meticulously crafted for those who appreciate distinctive details. Whether it's a date, location, monogram, initials, special message, or a name, our cufflinks make excellent gifts for dads, graduates, boyfriends, grooms, and wedding parties.

Materials & Craftsmanship:
• Material: Premium Quality 925 Sterling Silver and Durable Steel.
• Quantity: Listed as '1' refers to one pair (set) of cufflinks, ensuring clarity for our customers.
• Thickness: Our cufflinks boast an exclusive 2mm thickness, an uncommon feature that offers superior durability and design.
• Weight: Crafted with an average silver weight of 8-10 grams, depending on the selected letters, ensuring longevity and a premium feel.
• Finish: Sterling Silver, 18K Gold Filled, Dark Grey (RHODIUM).
• Production Method: Every pair is handmade, reflecting our commitment to quality.

Customization Options:
Tailor your cufflinks to suit your preferences. Whether it's a name, text, letters, number, or any other engravings, we've got you covered.

Ordering Process:
For a seamless experience, simply specify your desired engravings in the 'NOTES' section upon ordering.

Gift Wrapping:
Each set of our cufflinks comes in a beautifully designed gift box, making it perfect for occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, or just a special treat for yourself. Let us know if you'd like to include a personalized message for your loved one.

Shipping & Delivery:
• Handmade Just For You: Your order will be crafted in 1-3 business days.
• Shipping Options: Choose between standard shipping (7-9 days) or expedite with UPS Express (2-4 business days).

Connect With Us:
For our full collection and exclusive offers, visit:
www.etsy.com/shop/jewellerydesignstore

From the crafting table to your wardrobe, each piece is made with passion and precision. Warm wishes, ♡, Huseyin

interest/situation: May be interested in fashion design or working in the fashion industry
description: Our personalized cufflinks are meticulously crafted from premium quality 925 Sterling Silver and durable Steel, ensuring longevity and a luxurious feel. At 2mm thick, they offer superior durability and an uncommon design, making them stand out from generic counterparts. We offer tailored engraving options, allowing you to create truly unique cufflinks that reflect your personal style or commemorate special occasions. Each pair of cufflinks is meticulously handmade, showcasing our commitment to quality and attention to detail. Choose from Sterling Silver, 18K Gold Filled, or Dark Grey (RHODIUM) finishes to match your preferences and complement your wardrobe.
